div.a: Five Of Andrew Mason’s Most Ridiculous Moments

div.div: Groupon’s board just fired its CEO, Andrew Mason, the eccentric, party-boy entrepreneur who helped found the company. In Mason’s honor, we give you a handful of his best head-scratchers from the last few years.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/ZESY26&via=Digg&text=Five Of Andrew Mason’s Most Ridiculous Moments

div.a: Scientists Find Huge Meteorite In Antarctica

div.div: Scientists have found an 18 kg meteorite in Antarctica.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/145gNkn&via=Digg&text=Scientists Find Huge Meteorite In Antarctica

div.div: MORE FUN THAN A WEEKEND AT BERNIE'S

div.a: 10 Crazy Things To Do When You're Dead

div.div: We're all looking to get the most out of life. So who could blame you for packing a bit more into ... the afterlife?

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/XnKhsX&via=Digg&text=10 Crazy Things To Do When You're Dead

div.div: ANYTHING HERE NOT A DOUBLE ENTENDRE?

div.a: Bigger, Thicker, Cheaper, Plastic iPhone Rumored For Next Year

div.div: New report says Apple is cooking up a 4.5-inch plastic iPhone that will cost far less than current models but won't ship till next year.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/Y8WUYU&via=Digg&text=Bigger, Thicker, Cheaper, Plastic iPhone Rumored For Next Year

div.a: In Defense Of The Happy Girl

div.div: Oh, Anne! With your small head and pert nose and oversized, ready smile and glossy pixie cut and squeakily tuneful speaking voice, uttering lines like “It came true!” as you gaze at your newly won Oscar with moistened doe-eyes, wearing a powder-pink Prada gown adorned with diamonds and bows: Why are you so annoying?

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/XFpWAi&via=Digg&text=In Defense Of The Happy Girl

div.a: The Reason Wall Street Got So Rich, In Two Charts

div.div: So what accounts for the rise in Wall Street pay? Defenders of the compensation status quo tend to point to increased productivity. Foes ask, reasonably, what the heck folks on Wall Street do that makes them worth so much more.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/Z2AdVA&via=Digg&text=The Reason Wall Street Got So Rich, In Two Charts

div.a: A Visit To Iceland's Infamous Penis Museum

div.div: If you haven't heard of Sigurður Hjartarson by name, you've probably heard of his penis… museum. Hjartarson and his son Hjörtur Sigurðsson own and manage The Icelandic Phallological Museum in Reykjavik, which has the world's largest collection of penises and related artifacts.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/13rnocY&via=Digg&text=A Visit To Iceland's Infamous Penis Museum

div.a: Leaked Info Allegedly Shows The Absurd Lengths BofA Goes To Spy On Hackers

div.div: Anonymous hackers have released 14 gigabytes of information allegedly related to Bank of America and a web intelligence firm it hired to spy on hackers and social activists last year.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/15hNXQ8&via=Digg&text=Leaked Info Allegedly Shows The Absurd Lengths BofA Goes To Spy On Hackers

div.a: We Found Our Son In The Subway

div.div: My husband called me, frantic. “I found a baby!” he shouted. “I called 911, but I don’t think they believed me. No one’s coming. I don’t want to leave the baby alone. Get down here and flag down a police car or something.”

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/15lm9uj&via=Digg&text=We Found Our Son In The Subway

div.div: NO ONE ASKED FOR DADS' FEEDBACK

div.a: Moms Angry Over Sketchers' 'Daddy's Money' Shoes For Tweens

div.div: Moms aren't too pleased about a new ad targeting tweens – one that puts undue pressure on dads' credit cards.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/YCXaPd&via=Digg&text=Moms Angry Over Sketchers' 'Daddy's Money' Shoes For Tweens

div.div: IT'S LIKE SECURITY, FOR OUR COUNTRY

div.a: The Trillion-Dollar Concept That No One Can Define

div.div: There is no agreed-upon definition for just what homeland security is. The funds Washington has poured into the concept will soon enough approach a trillion dollars and yet it’s a concept with no clear boundaries that no one can agree on.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/Z2GLUd&via=Digg&text=The Trillion-Dollar Concept That No One Can Define

div.a: When Is It OK To Steal From Your Hotel?

div.div: Is it all right to snag soufflé cups, or am I just from a family of petty pilferers?

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/Y2NKu7&via=Digg&text=When Is It OK To Steal From Your Hotel?

div.a: How My Mom's Death Changed My Thinking About End-Of-Life Care

div.div: My father, sister and I sat in the near-empty Chinese restaurant, picking at our plates, unable to avoid the question that we'd gathered to discuss: When was it time to let Mom die?

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/V6PCGu&via=Digg&text=How My Mom's Death Changed My Thinking About End-Of-Life Care

div.a: A Gallery Of Envelopes That Claim To Be Important

div.div: A conspicuous contemporary trend in “traditional” dead-tree junk mail is to follow the basic format of phishing e-mail: it comes in disguise as legitimate “important” mail, to trick you into clicking on opening it.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/Y2BFFs&via=Digg&text=A Gallery Of Envelopes That Claim To Be Important

div.a: The Mystery Behind Chipotle's Secret, 1,500-Calorie Super Burrito

div.div: Chipotle, Starbucks, and In-N-Out don't see their 'secret menus' as secrets at all, but they represent a sea change in fast-food philosophy.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/XmnPjK&via=Digg&text=The Mystery Behind Chipotle's Secret, 1,500-Calorie Super Burrito

div.div: NOT ALL EGGS ARE OK TO FREEZE

div.a: The Shelf Life Of Food

div.div: Foods unopened, uncut or uncooked - unless stated otherwise - and their shelf life in the pantry, refrigerator and freezer.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/13qNdty&via=Digg&text=The Shelf Life Of Food

div.a: Here's How AT&T Is Planning To Rob Americans Of A Free Public Telco Network

div.div: AT&T has a sneaky plan. It wants to exploit a loophole in the Federal Communications Commission (FCC)’s rules to kill what remains of the public telecommunications network — and all of the consumer protections that go with it.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/ZL82iA&via=Digg&text=Here's How AT&T Is Planning To Rob Americans Of A Free Public Telco Network

div.div: YOU HAVE SOMETHING STUCK TO YOUR SHOE

div.a: Let's Roll Through The Virtual Toilet Paper Museum

div.div: Traditionally, the museums of America only displayed toilet paper in their restroom areas. Fortunately, those days are long over.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/15Rn8DF&via=Digg&text=Let's Roll Through The Virtual Toilet Paper Museum

div.a: Dennis Rodman and Kim Jong-Un Take In A Basketball Game

div.div: Earlier today former, Chicago Bulls superstar Dennis Rodman presided over a mixed-match basketball game in Pyongyang, North Korea, alongside Supreme Leader Kim Jong-un.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/Z39JTR&via=Digg&text=Dennis Rodman and Kim Jong-Un Take In A Basketball Game

div.a: This Sex-Ed Speech Was Banned Because It Might Teach Hackers To Rape

div.div: To understand what just happened to noted sex educator Violet Blue at Security BSides San Francisco, you have to pose this question: Are hackers well-meaning partiers or potential date rapists?

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/WtvRoK&via=Digg&text=This Sex-Ed Speech Was Banned Because It Might Teach Hackers To Rape

div.a: Trailer Park Hotels

div.div: No American road trip would be complete without a stop at a trailer park palace. Here are some of the best.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/13istnV&via=Digg&text=Trailer Park Hotels

div.a: Pessimism Might Help You Live Longer

div.div: Low expectations for a happy future might actually propel you into old age.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/VQQNca&via=Digg&text=Pessimism Might Help You Live Longer

div.a: Insane Plan To Send Humans To Mars In 2018 Might Not Be So Crazy

div.div: An ambitious private manned mission to Mars aims to launch a two-person crew to fly around the Red Planet and return to Earth in 501 days, starting in January 2018. And they just might pull it off.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/13XCPFH&via=Digg&text=Insane Plan To Send Humans To Mars In 2018 Might Not Be So Crazy

div.a: Miss Subways Then And Now

div.div: As commuters rode the New York City subway in the 1940s, their eyes were drawn to posters of pretty young women, winners of the Miss Subways beauty contest. So what do they look like now? And how were their lives changed by the contest?

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/ZKgM8A&via=Digg&text=Miss Subways Then And Now

div.a: Dudes With AOL Email Addresses Most Likely To Visit Strip Clubs

div.div: When you hear of someone who has an AOL email address, what’s the first thought that comes to mind? A dad? Someone who still uses dialup? A TechCrunch employee? Now you can add “strip club aficionado” to your stereotypes of AOL email users.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/YKtvph&via=Digg&text=Dudes With AOL Email Addresses Most Likely To Visit Strip Clubs

div.a: Infrared Digital Holography Allows Firefighters To See Through Flames

div.div: One of their greatest challenges for firefighters is seeing through thick veils of smoke and walls of flame to find people in need of rescue.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/Y2gbIw&via=Digg&text=Infrared Digital Holography Allows Firefighters To See Through Flames

div.a: Scenes From When Flying Was Still Civilized

div.div: There once was a Golden Age Of Flying. You didn't have to queue up, strip down, and surrender your beverage to the Goon Squad.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/Z2I7hI&via=Digg&text=Scenes From When Flying Was Still Civilized

div.a: Police Caught Dragging Man From Van In Horrific Death Case

div.div: They bound his hands to the rear of a van, and then sped off, dragging the slender taxi driver along the pavement as a crowd of onlookers shouted in dismay. The man was later found dead.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/VQ0t6G&via=Digg&text=Police Caught Dragging Man From Van In Horrific Death Case

div.div: SMOGGY WITH A CHANCE OF CANCER

div.a: The Most Shocking Photo Of Beijing Air Pollution I've Ever Seen

div.div: China’s air pollution has been bad lately. Really, really bad. We’ve posted photos of it before, but this shot really drives home how severe this has gotten.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/WjFBr0&via=Digg&text=The Most Shocking Photo Of Beijing Air Pollution I've Ever Seen

div.a: What Is The Most Popular Sushi in Japan?

div.div: Sushi is delicious. There's a variety of different kinds, but certainly everyone has his or her favorite. And if you do the math, you should be able to deduce the most popular kind of sushi in Japan. So let's do that. Math.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/15kGOyK&via=Digg&text=What Is The Most Popular Sushi in Japan?

div.a: Russia - A Car Takes Off

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/12dNBwr&via=Digg&text=Russia - A Car Takes Off

div.a: 'Girls Gone Wild' Files For Bankruptcy

div.div: The company behind the “Girls Gone Wild” videos filed bankruptcy to protect itself from a $10.3 million debt claimed by Steve Wynn’s Wynn Las Vegas LLC.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/VQer8A&via=Digg&text='Girls Gone Wild' Files For Bankruptcy

div.div: DO AS WE SAY, NOT AS WE DID

div.a: Gangster's Paradise

div.div: The untold history of the United States and international crime.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/YCJpQr&via=Digg&text=Gangster's Paradise
